imdb.plot outline: A group of nomads travel the world by horses, camping and self-sustaining themselves throughout diverse activities that go from educational programs to artistic shows. The caravan members are concerned for our mother nature and will do whatever is in their hands to teach the world how to live in communion with plants, animals and everything that surrounds us. This reality-TV show experience will teach us how it is possible to live without so many material commodities and to enjoy nature and everything it has to provide for us.
imdb.title: Nómadas
plot: A group of nomads travel the world by horses, camping and self-sustaining themselves throughout diverse activities that go from educational programs to artistic shows. The caravan members are concerned for our mother nature and will do whatever is in their hands to teach the world how to live in communion with plants, animals and everything that surrounds us. This reality-TV show experience will teach us how it is possible to live without so many material commodities and to enjoy nature and everything it has to provide for us.::Carlos A. Corona San Pedro

Tired of the modern capitalist vortex, a group of people from different countries undertake a journey with no return to become real citizens of the world. Traveling the road by feet or by horse, the travelers return to the early roots of the human being by living separated from consumerism, coexisting with nature and reconnecting their spirituality through practices such as meditation and nature studies. "Nomads", a documentary series that captures a journey of more than 14 years, where adventure leads to self discovery, and the old errant ways of life collect adepts on its path.::Btf
